oversee.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to be in charge of a group of workers and check that a piece of work is done satisfactorily
oversee.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: A team leader was appointed to oversee the project.
oversee.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to organize and control an activity or the work that people or an organization do
oversee.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: A team leader was appointed to oversee the project.
oversee.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to be responsible for making investments
oversee.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: He oversaw $80 billion in assets in his previous post.
oversee.translation[1].definitions[2].de: to check that an activity is being performed honestly and legally
oversee.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: The government set up a state watchdog to oversee the countryâ€™s alcohol production.
